text_block_list.name: Customer A
text_block_list.text: …… Excuse me, Master?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ……? How can I help you?

text_block_list.name: Customer A
text_block_list.text:
Could I ask for your advice? 
Umm… there's someone I want to give chocolate to…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …! Of course. I'm here to listen.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Eheh. You're doing great. I can tell you're acting 
much more like yourself than the first day.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, you think? That would be good.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hey, Ines. Do you think I got closer to my ideal?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: … Yeah. For sure. You're very much like SweeTea's Master.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I see… 
Hey, Ines.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Thanks for watching over me.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ehh…? That's……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Chocolates, of course. For everything you've done for me.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hwaaah! Thank you!! For real～? I'll be sure to enjoy these with my little sisters!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Aaah, well…… umm.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Change your mind?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Sorry. If you don't mind me being frank…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
…… I'd like you to have them all. 
For always being by my side.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
So just this once… could you keep 
these chocolates all to yourself?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ……! …… Maan, I can't say no to that～

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ―― I'll savour them on my own then.

Apparently there's a special limited-time café 
somewhere near Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, have you heard of that one café? 
Word has it everyone comes out feeling refreshed!

text_block_list.name: Young Woman A
text_block_list.text:
Of course I've heard! It's said— 
That they serve up that precious courage you need.

text_block_list.name: Young Woman B
text_block_list.text:
That's right — I've been served my courage there already. 
I'm sure, anyone that goes there……

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Welcome!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: To our café! Hehen, this way, this way☆

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, welcome! The sun's out and shining today so the 
window seats feel great♪ I'll bring you the menu.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Bono♪ We just finished a new parfait, would you like to try it?

Led by the floor staff, I entered a café where I was 
welcomed by friendly staff and a kind pâtissier.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
…… Are you looking for a sweet memory? 
Or do you need a little encouragement?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ehehee. Please take a chocolate first. 
They're our pride and joy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Please take your time. Until your heart finds 
peace, until your heart finds its strength.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ―― Such is our café.
